name: Forms Rb
author: The Upzilla Team

sections.description:
Create a simple and fast hosted contact form on your WordPress blog with just in few clicks. After forms rb plugins installation you just need to create a form instance in the forms manager and set up the required fields for the form.

Create an unlimited amount of independent forms with different fields. You can manage your contact form or order form in the forms manager – the main screen of the forms rb plugin.

Every created contact form has options where you can easily customize the fields of the forms. You can select which fields your form should contain. Also, every form settings section has records of the data which was sent from the page with this particular contact form.

You can use this form’s rb plugin as a tool for different types of forms like contact forms, support forms, order forms, feedback forms, and much more. You can use the most popular fields like name, email, message, agreement, phone, subject, and priority. You don’t need any special knowledge to manage the field of the form you can turn on or turn off every field of the form in a few clicks.

The most important that all requests which your clients or website visitors gonna send via forms created with the forms rb plugin you’ll see in the WordPress admin section. You’ll not lose any contact, feedback, or request from your website.

In the forms rb admin section, you can manage all messages which were sent to you from your website. In the forms admin section, you can see all messages in the records section of the form settings. You can preview all data collected by forms from every request. You can see new messages marked as unread messages in the list like in every email client. You can delete old or useless messages, you can use the mass operation button to manage sets of messages, not just one-by-one message records in the form settings.

With the Forms Rb plugin, you can create a form in a popup that could be customized in contact form settings. In form settings, you can enable floating button mode when the form will open in a popup after clicking on send request buttons which gonna be published on all pages of your WordPress blog.

Contact form mode: direct link to the contact form page, contact form popup, inline contact form

In close future, we’ll add advanced notification methods to the telegram, Facebook messenger, slack, email, SMS, and much more integrations with other popular plugins and online services.

We’re working on the integration of the forms plugin with the cloud service where users will be able to manage all messages which will be saved in the cloud. With the service, users will be able to make a backup of the contacts and messages received from the website users. All submitted info will be saved in the protected member place.

Security and data protection are very important to us. We’ll add a google captcha field to the form to protect your forms from unwanted spam messages.

In the forms rb possible to customize the styles of the forms with the settings implemented in the admin section. In the current version possible to customize forms fields, styles, colors, labels of the fields, and buttons. All styles will look the same in the popup with the form or in the case if the form will be published as inline form in the post.
sections.faq:
How to create a form with the forms rb plugin?

Just install the forms rb plugin from the WordPress plugins directory and create a form in the forms manager. Add new forms, customize fields and save them. You can use it as a direct link.

Can this plugin be used to create a form on the WordPress site?

Yes.

Is the forms rb plugin paid or free?

Yes, it’s free.

Can this plugin be used to create a contact form on the WordPress site?

Yes, it’s possible.

Where I can manage the fields of the form?

You can manage the fields of the forms in every form settings section.

How many forms I can create for a single website in the forms rb plugin?

You can create an unlimited amount of the different forms in the forms rb plugin.

Where I can find all requests which were sent with the order form?

Every form has records settings where you can find all requests with all details which were sent from the form page by your website users.

Which type of forms are possible to create with the forms rb?

You can create a contact form, order form, feedback form, review form, or support form, depending on your needs.

Can I customize styles for the floating button?

Yes, you can modify the styles of the floating button to make it more attractive and fit to your website design.

Can I customize an icon for the floating button?

Yes, in the forms rb admin section main options block of every form you can select icons from the list for the defined icons for your contact form button.

Can I change the color of the contact form button on the page?

Yes, in the forms rb admin section main options block of every form you can select a color from the list for the available for your contact form button.

Can I change the size of the contact form button on the page?

Yes, in the forms rb admin section main options block of every form you can select a size from the list for the available options for your contact form floating button.

Can I select which contact form will be in a dialog popup?

Yes, can enable dialog mode in one form configured contact forms to show the contact form button on every page. It’s could have different labels, icons, colors, and sizes. For example, this button could be linked to the order form, support form, request form or contact form, depending on your needs.

Where I can change the title for the contact form popup?

You can change the title of the contact form popup in the forms rb admin section/form options/form dialog title option. There you can add some custom form titles for every contact form you have in the forms list.

Where I can change the description for the contact form popup?

You can change the description of the contact form popup in the forms rb admin section/form options/form dialog description option. There you can add some custom form descriptions for every contact form you have in the forms list.

Where I can change the label of the submit button for the contact form popup?

You can change the submit button label of the contact form popup in the forms rb admin section/form options/form dialog submit button option.

Where I can change the label of the close button for the contact form popup?

You can change the close button label of the contact form popup in the forms rb admin section/form options/form dialog close button option.

Where I can find forms fields management?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the fields. There you’ll be able to configure contact form fields.

Where I can enable the Name field for the contact form?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the fields. There you’ll be able to configure contact form fields. One of the options it’s the Name field status.

Where I can enable the Email field for the contact form?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the fields. There you’ll be able to configure contact form fields. One of the options it’s the Email field status.

Where I can enable the Message field for the contact form?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the fields. There you’ll be able to configure contact form fields. One of the options it’s the Message field status.

Where I can enable the Agreement field for the contact form?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the fields. There you’ll be able to configure contact form fields. One of the options it’s the Agreement field status.

Where I can enable the Phone field for the contact form?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the fields. There you’ll be able to configure contact form fields. One of the options it’s the Phone field status.

Where I can enable the Subject field for the contact form?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the fields. There you’ll be able to configure contact form fields. One of the options it’s the Subject field status.

Where I can enable the Priority field for the contact form?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the fields. There you’ll be able to configure contact form fields. One of the options it’s the Priority field status.

Where I can enable the Reset field for the contact form?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the fields. There you’ll be able to configure contact form fields. One of the options it’s the Reset field status.

Where to change the label of the floating button?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the main. When you enable the floating contact form button you’ll see additional options. There you’ll see the Floating Button Label option. Just enable this option and the Floating Button Text will be below this field.

Where to change the icon of the floating button?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the main. When you enable the floating contact form button you’ll see additional options. There you’ll see the Floating Button Icon option where you’ll be able to change the default icon for the form.

Where to change the icon color of the floating button?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the main. When you enable the floating contact form button you’ll see additional options. There you’ll see the Floating Button Icon Color option where you’ll be able to change the color of the floating button icon.

Where to change the size of the floating button?

Open the forms admin section and in the forms list select an item you wish to edit. When you open the required form options scroll down to the options settings block and switch tab to the main. When you enable the floating contact form button you’ll see additional options. There you’ll see the Floating Button Size option where you’ll be able to change the size of the floating button.
